original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: in that buddha-field,

original: sa chen po 'di gzhi beed'urya sngon po'i rgya las grub pa /
analyzed: sa chen po 'di gzhi beed'urya sngon po'i rgya las grub pa /
translated: this great earth will be made of blue beryl,🔽and will be covered with golden sand.

original: gser gyi bye ma bdal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: gser gyi bye ma bdal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the six perfections like that.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I will purify a buddha-field.🔽I will bring beings to maturity.’

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: They should investigate like that.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhuti, a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who practices like this will perfect the six perfections,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and will also approach omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, when Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the six perfections,

original: sems can bdag tu bya ba'i yongs su 'dzin pa la gnas pa dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can bdag tu bya ba'i yongs su 'dzin pa la gnas pa dag mthong na /
translated: if they see sentient beings attached to the view of a self,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should contemplate in this way:🔽'By what means can I, having attained supreme awakening,

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: in that Buddha land,

original: sems can rnams bdag gir bya ba la yongs su 'dzin pa mi 'byung zhing mi srid pa dang / sems can thams cad bdag gi med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med @217a *//
analyzed: sems can rnams bdag gir bya ba la yongs su 'dzin pa mi 'byung zhing mi srid pa dang / sems can thams cad bdag gi med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med @217a *//
translated: There is no grasping and no possibility of grasping in relation to beings, and all beings are without self and without grasping.🔽

original: par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: “I should practice the six perfections in such a way that I will not be subject to grasping and will not be subject to the nonexistence of sentient beings, and that all sentient beings will be without grasping and will be without the nonexistence of sentient beings.”

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: “I should purify a buddhafield.”

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: “I should bring sentient beings to maturity.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that complete the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and get close to the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the six perfections

original: rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / rigs bzhi po mthong na /
analyzed: rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / rigs bzhi po mthong na /
translated: When he sees the four castes,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: he should investigate as follows:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: ‘In such and such ways I should practice the six perfections so that in my Buddha-field, when I have attained supreme enlightenment,

original: chung ngu na rigs bzhi'i sgra'ang mi grag cing; mi srid pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: chung ngu na rigs bzhi'i sgra'ang mi grag cing; mi srid pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: even the words “four castes” will not exist, let alone the castes themselves.🔽I should purify a Buddha-field, I should develop beings.’

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: Subhuti: Thus should a Bodhisattva investigate.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: A Bodhisattva, a great being who courses thus fulfills the six perfections, and quickly knows full enlightenment.

original: @217b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: @217b rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and they will also have approached omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe; sems can rab dang 'bring dang / tha ma mthong ba dang / sems can rigs mtho ba dang / rigs dma' ba mthong na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe; sems can rab dang 'bring dang / tha ma mthong ba dang / sems can rigs mtho ba dang / rigs dma' ba mthong na /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections see sentient beings who are superior, middling, and inferior, and see sentient beings of high caste and low caste,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should investigate as follows:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: ‘In whatever way I may fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, in that buddhafield

original: sems can rnams kyi nyes pa 'di dag mi 'byung zhing; mi srid pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi nyes pa 'di dag mi 'byung zhing; mi srid pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the six perfections in such a way that these faults of sentient beings will not occur, and will not be possible.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I will purify a buddhafield.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: “I must bring sentient beings to full maturity.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that complete the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and get close to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the six perfections,

original: sems can kha dog tha dad pa dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can kha dog tha dad pa dag mthong na /
translated: if they see sentient beings of different complexions,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should reflect deeply,🔽thinking, ‘I must practice the six perfections,🔽and when I have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs @218a *//🔽rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs @218a *//🔽rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: in my buddhafield

original: sems can rnams kha dog tha dad pa mi 'byung zhing mi srid pa dang / gzhan du na sems can thams cad gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po'i mchog rgyas pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kha dog tha dad pa mi 'byung zhing mi srid pa dang / gzhan du na sems can thams cad gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po'i mchog rgyas pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: and that it is impossible for sentient beings to have different complexions, then he should practice the six perfections just as they are taught, so that all sentient beings will have good complexions, be beautiful, pleasing to look at, and have the most sublime, excellent color.🔽He should purify a buddhafield and bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: He should investigate in this way.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that complete the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and get close to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the six perfections

original: sems can dag la bdag po yod par mthong na /
analyzed: sems can dag la bdag po yod par mthong na /
translated: If he sees that sentient beings have a master,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /🔽ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste / ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: he should investigate as follows:🔽“In whatever way I may practice the six perfections,🔽may the designation of a master not occur in my buddha-field when I have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, and may it be impossible.

original: bdag por gdags pa mi 'byung zhing mi srid pa dang / gzhan du na chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad @218b par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag por gdags pa mi 'byung zhing mi srid pa dang / gzhan du na chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad @218b par bya'o //
translated: May the Dharma King, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Genuine Supremely Perfect Buddha be present.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I should refine the buddha-field.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: I should bring sentient beings to full maturity.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhuti, a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who practices like this will perfect the six pāramitās

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and approach omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhuti, when Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the six pāramitās,

original: sems can rnams kyi lam tha dad pa mthong na /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi lam tha dad pa mthong na /
translated: if they see sentient beings with different paths,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste; ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can lha dang / mi dang / sems can dmyal ba pa dang; byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste; ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can lha dang / mi dang / sems can dmyal ba pa dang; byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /
translated: they should contemplate like this: ‘In whatever way I may attain supreme awakening and manifest perfect buddhahood, in that buddha-field, sentient beings, whether gods, humans, hell beings, animals,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lam tha dad pa med cing mi srid pa dang / gzhan du na sems can thams cad lam gcig tu 'gyur zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang ma bral ba dang /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lam tha dad pa med cing mi srid pa dang / gzhan du na sems can thams cad lam gcig tu 'gyur zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang ma bral ba dang /
translated: Otherwise, all sentient beings would be on one path, not separated from the four establishments of mindfulness, not separated from the four correct renunciations,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / dbang po lnga dang ma bral ba dang / stobs lnga dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ma bral ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ma bral ba dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / dbang po lnga dang ma bral ba dang / stobs lnga dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ma bral ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ma bral ba dang /
translated: not separated from the four legs of magical manifestation, not separated from the five faculties, not separated from the five powers, not separated from the seven branches of enlightenment, not separated from the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / @219a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / @219a *//
translated: not separated from the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ma bral ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang ma bral ba dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ma bral ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang ma bral ba dang /
translated: They are not separated from the four concentrations, they are not separated from the four immeasurables, they are not separated from the four formless absorptions, they are not separated from the eight deliverances, they are not separated from the nine serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang ma bral ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ma bral ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ma bral ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ma bral ba dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang ma bral ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ma bral ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ma bral ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ma bral ba dang /
translated: they are not separated from the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation, they are not separated from the five clairvoyances, they are not separated from the meditative stabilizations, they are not separated from the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ma bral ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / byams pa chen po dang ma bral ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ma bral ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ma bral ba dang / byams pa chen po dang ma bral ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba dang /
translated: He should practice the six perfections like this: not separating from the ten powers of a Tathagata, not separating from the four fearlessnesses, not separating from the four unobstructed knowledges, not separating from the great love, not separating from the great compassion,🔽not separating from the eighteen special qualities of a Buddha, he should purify a Buddha-field and he should mature beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ma bral ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ma bral ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: He should practice the six perfections like this:🔽Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in perfect wisdom, how should he review the six perfections?🔽The Lord: He should review them as empty.🔽Subhuti : How should he review emptiness?🔽The Lord: He should review emptiness as emptiness.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: Subhuti : How should he review the perfection of giving?🔽The Lord: He should review it as not being a maker.🔽Subhuti : How should he review the perfection of morality?🔽The Lord: He should review it as not being a doer.🔽Subhuti : How should he review the perfection of patience?🔽The Lord: He should review it as not being a patient one.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhuti : How should he review the perfection of vigour?🔽The Lord: He should review it as not being a maker of exertion.🔽Subhuti : How should he review the perfection of meditation?🔽The Lord: He should review it as not being a maker of concentration.🔽Subhuti : How should he review the perfection of wisdom?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: The Lord: He should review it as not being a maker of cognition.

original: rab 'byor / @219b gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / @219b gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the six perfections,

original: sems can rnams kyi skye gnas bzhir skyes pa /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi skye gnas bzhir skyes pa /
translated: when they see beings born in the four modes of birth,

original: sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzu ba pa rnams mthong na 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzu ba pa rnams mthong na 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: born from an egg, born from a womb, born from heat and moisture, or born miraculously, they should investigate as follows:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: ‘In whatever way I may fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and manifest buddhahood,

original: sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba'i gnas gsum po rnams mi 'byung zhing mi srid pa dang / gzhan du na sems can thams cad brdzub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba'i gnas gsum po rnams mi 'byung zhing mi srid pa dang / gzhan du na sems can thams cad brdzub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: in that buddha-field, the three modes of birth from an egg, from a womb, or from heat and moisture will not occur, will not be possible, and instead all beings will be born miraculously. I should practice the six perfections in that way.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I must purify a Buddha-field.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: I must bring beings to maturity.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in this way, does he then also perfect the six perfections, and approach the knowledge of all modes?🔽The Lord : Yes, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in this way, does he then also perfect the six perfections, and approach the knowledge of all modes.

original: sems can mngon par shes pa lnga dang mi ldan pa dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can mngon par shes pa lnga dang mi ldan pa dag mthong na /
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in the six perfections, when he sees beings who are not endowed with the five superknowledges,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /🔽ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par @220a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste / ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par @220a *//
translated: he should thus train himself:

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: 'I must exert myself in such a way that in my Buddha-field those beings will be endowed with the five superknowledges.

original: sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I must practice the six perfections like that so that all sentient beings will have the five superknowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I must purify a buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: I must bring sentient beings to maturity.’

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that complete the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: and get close to the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: sems can rnams kyi bshang gci dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bshang gci dag mthong na /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections see sentient beings’ feces and urine,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should investigate like this:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /🔽sems can thams cad chos dang / dga' ba dang / bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na / sems can thams cad chos dang / dga' ba dang / bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: In every way I must practice the six perfections so that in my buddha-field, when I have attained supreme perfect enlightenment,🔽all beings will live on the food of dhyāna and on the joy of the Dharma.’🔽

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: In every way I should practice the six perfections, purify a Buddha-field, and bring beings to maturity, so that in my Buddha-field, when I have attained highest genuine full Awakening, all beings will eat the food of Dharma and of concentration.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang @220b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste / rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang @220b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Thus should he reflect.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in this way, does he then also complete the six perfections, and approach the knowledge of all modes?🔽The Lord : He does.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the six perfections,

original: 'od dang mi ldan pa'i sems can dag mthong na /
analyzed: 'od dang mi ldan pa'i sems can dag mthong na /
translated: if they see sentient beings who are not luminous,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should investigate as follows:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: ‘In whatever way I may be able to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and become a buddha,🔽in that buddhafield all sentient beings will have light emanating from their own bodies.

original: sems can thams cad rang las 'od 'byung ba sha stag yod pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rang las 'od 'byung ba sha stag yod pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the six perfections like that,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I will purify a buddhafield like that,

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: I will bring sentient beings to maturity like that.’

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhuti, a Bodhisattva-mahāsattva who practices like this will perfect the six perfections,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and will also approach omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, when Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the six perfections,🔽if they see sentient beings' days and nights, months and fortnights,

original: sems can rnams kyi nyin mtshan dang / zla ba dang / yud du yan man dang / dus mtshams dang / lo dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi nyin mtshan dang / zla ba dang / yud du yan man dang / dus mtshams dang / lo dag mthong na /
translated: and years and seasons,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should investigate this:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa @221a *//
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa @221a *//
translated: 'How can I, having attained🔽supreme perfect enlightenment,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: in that Buddha land,

original: sems can rnams kyi nyin mtshan dang / zla ba dang; yud du yan man dang / dus mtshams dang / lo'i sgra'ang mi grag cing mi srid pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi nyin mtshan dang / zla ba dang; yud du yan man dang / dus mtshams dang / lo'i sgra'ang mi grag cing mi srid pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: “Thus should you practice the six perfections, thus should you purify a buddhafield, thus should you mature beings, thus should you go forth into the certainty of a buddha’s powers, fearlessnesses, and special buddhaqualities, thus should you stand in the knowledge of all modes, thus should you fully know all dharmas, thus should you turn the wheel of the Dharma, thus should you show the extinction of all the outflows, and thus should you demonstrate the extinction of a Tathagata.”

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: “Thus should you practice the six perfections, thus should you purify a buddhafield, thus should you mature beings.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: “Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in this way, fully accomplishes the six perfections,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and he approaches the knowledge of all modes.”

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /

translated: 'In whatever way I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and become a buddha,🔽in that buddha-field, all sentient beings will possess the thirty-two major marks of a great being.

analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: “I must purify a Buddha-field.”

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who practice like this complete the six perfections

analyzed: sems can nad kyis btab pa dag mthong na /
translated: When he sees beings afflicted by disease,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /🔽ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /🔽sems can rnams la rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa'i nad gzhi med par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste / ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na / sems can rnams la rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa'i nad gzhi med par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: he should reflect in the following manner:

original: sems can rnams yongs su @222b smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su @222b smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: “I should practice the six perfections, I should fully purify a Buddha-field, I should bring beings to maturity, so that in my Buddha-field, when I have attained highest genuine full Awakening, beings will be free from the four hundred and four diseases.🔽”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: Subhuti, a Bodhisattva-mahasattva who practices like this will perfect the six perfections and approach omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, when Bodhisattva-mahasattvas practice the six perfections,

original: nyon mongs pa gsum gyis nyon mongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa gsum gyis nyon mongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na /
translated: if they see sentient beings afflicted by the three poisons,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should contemplate thus:🔽In whatever Buddha-land I will attain supreme perfect enlightenment,

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na / 'di lta ste /
translated: in that Buddha-land,

original: sems can rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa gsum mi 'byung zhing /
analyzed: sems can rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa gsum mi 'byung zhing /
translated: may sentient beings not be afflicted by the three poisons of desire, anger, and ignorance.

original: sems can thams cad kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba /
translated: and all sentient beings are free from desire,

original: zhe sdang dang bral ba /
analyzed: zhe sdang dang bral ba /
translated: free from hatred,🔽free from delusion,

original: gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I should practice the six perfections like that.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I should purify a buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: I should bring sentient beings to maturity.’

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that complete the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems @223a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems @223a *//
translated: and get close to the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the six perfections

original: sems can mos pa chung ngu dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can mos pa chung ngu dag mthong na /
translated: and see sentient beings with little interest,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should reflect as follows:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: In every way I must practice the six perfections, purify a Buddha-field, and mature beings, so that in my Buddha-field, when I have attained supreme enlightenment,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa gnyis kyi sgra'ang mi grag cing /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa gnyis kyi sgra'ang mi grag cing /
translated: the words “disciple-vehicle” and “solitary buddha-vehicle” will not be heard,🔽and all beings will be set on universal enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //🔽sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o // sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: Thus should he reflect.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: The Bodhisattva, the great being who courses in this way, courses in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and they will also be close to the knowledge of all modes.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhuti, when the Bodhisattva, the great being, courses in the six perfections,

original: sems can nga rgyal can dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can nga rgyal can dag mthong na /
translated: if he sees proud beings,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: he should thus train himself:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: ‘I should train in the six perfections, purify the Buddha-field, and mature beings, so that in my Buddha-field, when I have won full enlightenment,

original: nga rgyal can gyi sgra'ang mi grag @223b cing gzhan du na /🔽sems can thams cad yang dag pa'i don shes shing /
analyzed: nga rgyal can gyi sgra'ang mi grag @223b cing gzhan du na / sems can thams cad yang dag pa'i don shes shing /
translated: there will not even be the word “pride,”

original: nga rgyal med par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal med par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: and all beings will be endowed with the knowledge of the true meaning and will be free from pride.’

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: He should purify the Buddha-field.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: “I must bring sentient beings to full maturity.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that complete the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and get close to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the six perfections,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should investigate as follows:

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: ‘In whatever way I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, in that buddhafield

original: tshe la tshad du 'gyur ba dang / 'od la tshad du 'gyur ba dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la tshad du 'gyur ba de tsam gyis /
analyzed: tshe la tshad du 'gyur ba dang / 'od la tshad du 'gyur ba dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la tshad du 'gyur ba de tsam gyis /
translated: I will have a life span with a limit, I will have a light with a limit, and I will have a community of monks with a limit.’

original: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i /
analyzed: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i /
translated: I will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: I will do whatever it takes to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening as a buddha in a buddhafield where there is no measure of lifespan,

original: tshe'i tshad med par 'gyur ba dang // 'od kyi tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun tshad med par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha @224a *//
analyzed: tshe'i tshad med par 'gyur ba dang // 'od kyi tshad med par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun tshad med par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha @224a *//
translated: where there is no measure of light, and where there is no measure of the saṅgha of monks.

original: rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I will practice the six perfections like that.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I will purify a buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: I will bring beings to maturity.’

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and they will also be close to the knowledge of all modes.

original: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'gyur ba de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: I should practice the six perfections in such a way that the world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges will be my one buddha-field.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: I should purify a buddha-field.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: I should bring beings to maturity.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu @224b phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu @224b phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that complete the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: and get close to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the six perfections they should reflect as follows:

original: kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni ring ngo //
analyzed: kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni ring ngo //
translated: ‘Alas, this saṃsāra is long!

original: kye ma sems can gyi khams 'di ni mtha' yas so //
analyzed: kye ma sems can gyi khams 'di ni mtha' yas so //
translated: Alas, the realm of sentient beings is infinite.

original: des 'di ltar tshul bzhin yid la byas te /
analyzed: des 'di ltar tshul bzhin yid la byas te /
translated: He should reflect properly in this way:

original: kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni nam mkha' ltar mu med pa'o //
analyzed: kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni nam mkha' ltar mu med pa'o //
translated: Alas, this saṃsāra is endless like space.

original: kye ma sems can gyi khams 'di ni nam mkha' ltar mu med pa ste /
analyzed: kye ma sems can gyi khams 'di ni nam mkha' ltar mu med pa ste /
translated: Alas, the realm of sentient beings is endless like space.

original: 'di la gang yang 'khor ba'ang med; mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang med do /🔽gzhan du na chos kyi brdar sems can nam /
analyzed: 'di la gang yang 'khor ba'ang med; mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang med do / gzhan du na chos kyi brdar sems can nam /
translated: Here there is no saṃsāra at all, nor is there nirvāṇa.

original: 'khor ba'am / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes tha snyed du btags par zad do zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba'am / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes tha snyed du btags par zad do zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: Other than that, sentient beings, saṃsāra, and nirvāṇa are mere designations as conventional symbols for phenomena.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice accordingly will perfect the six transcendent perfections,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and they will also approach omniscience.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: From the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: le'u bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o ////
translated: Chapter XLII

original: de nas 'khor der gangg'a'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i bud med cig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas /
analyzed: de nas 'khor der gangg'a'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i bud med cig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas /
translated: Then a woman named Ganga Devi, who was in the assembly, rose from her seat, arranged her upper robe over one shoulder,

original: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /🔽bcom ldan 'das ga @225a *//
analyzed: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te / bcom ldan 'das ga @225a *//
translated: and knelt on her right knee.

original: la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
analyzed: la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
translated: With palms placed together she bowed to the Lord

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and made this request of the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste /
translated: “Lord, I too will complete the six perfections🔽and, in accordance with the way this perfection of wisdom of the Tathagata, the Arhat, the fully enlightened Buddha has been taught, I will take up such a buddhafield.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de skad du bstan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu yongs su bzung bar bgyi'o zhes nas bud med des gser gyi me tog
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de skad du bstan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu yongs su bzung bar bgyi'o zhes nas bud med des gser gyi me tog
translated: Then that woman took golden flowers

original: dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gser gyi kha dog gi na bza' phrugs su sbyar te /
analyzed: dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gser gyi kha dog gi na bza' phrugs su sbyar te /
translated: all ornaments, and golden-colored garments,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su gtor to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su gtor to //
translated: and scattered them toward the Blessed One.

original: me tog dang / rgyan dang / na bza' phrugs su sbyar ba de dag gtor ma thag tu /
analyzed: me tog dang / rgyan dang / na bza' phrugs su sbyar ba de dag gtor ma thag tu /
translated: As soon as those flowers, ornaments, and garments were scattered,

original: sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa grva bzhi dang ldan pa ka ba bzhi zug pa cha mnyam pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa grva bzhi dang ldan pa ka ba bzhi zug pa cha mnyam pa /
translated: through the Buddha’s power they became a four-sided, four-cornered,

original: shin tu spa ba /
analyzed: shin tu spa ba /
translated: well-proportioned,

original: mdangs dga' ba /
analyzed: mdangs dga' ba /
translated: beautiful,

original: yid du 'ong ba gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba gnas par gyur to //
translated: and delightful mansion in the sky above the Blessed One’s head.

original: de nas bud med des khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: de nas bud med des khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: Then the woman dedicated that mansion to all beings

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so //
translated: and made a vow to attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One, understanding the woman’s thoughts,

original: @225b de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
analyzed: @225b de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
translated: at that time smiled.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de /
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de /
translated: This is the nature of the Blessed Buddhas:

original: gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they smile,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa du ma 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa du ma 'di lta ste /
translated: from the Blessed One’s mouth emerge light rays of many different colors, such as

original: sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu thon par gyur nas /
analyzed: sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu thon par gyur nas /

analyzed: de dag mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dong ste /

analyzed: phyir 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la g-yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
translated: and then disappear into the crown of the Blessed One’s head.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te /
translated: Then the venerable Nanda arranged his upper robe over one shoulder🔽and

analyzed: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas /
translated: He knelt on his right knee,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de /
translated: bowed to the Blessed One with palms joined,

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par ni /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par ni /
translated: without cause or reason

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
translated: the Thus-Gone One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Buddha does not smile.

original: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad /
analyzed: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad /
translated: What is the cause, what is the reason for your smile?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Nanda, this sister named Gaṅgadevī

analyzed: dga' bo / gangg'a'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sring mo 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
translated: in the future,

original: dpe skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la /🔽gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @226a *//
analyzed: dpe skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la / gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @226a *//
translated: in the eon called Star-like,

original: rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will appear in the world as the thus-gone one, the worthy one, the perfect buddha called Golden Flower.

original: dga' bo / 'di ni bud med 'di'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin te /
analyzed: dga' bo / 'di ni bud med 'di'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin te /
translated: Nanda, this is the last time this woman will have a female body.

original: dga' bo / sring mo 'di bud med kyi lus rjes te; skyes pa'i lus thob par gyur nas /
analyzed: dga' bo / sring mo 'di bud med kyi lus rjes te; skyes pa'i lus thob par gyur nas /
translated: Ananda, this sister will change her female body and obtain a male body.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi sgul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi sgul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes te /
translated: She will be reborn in the world of Abhirati in the Buddha-land of the Tathagata Arhat Samyaksambuddha Akshobhya.

original: der tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: There she will practice pure conduct.

original: dga' bo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming yang gser gyi me tog ces bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dga' bo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming yang gser gyi me tog ces bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: Ananda, the name of that Bodhisattva Mahasattva will be Suvarnapuspa.

original: dga' bo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi me tog de nas shi 'phos nas /
analyzed: dga' bo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi me tog de nas shi 'phos nas /
translated: Ananda, after the Bodhisattva Mahasattva Suvarnapuspa dies,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te /

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will never be separated from the Buddhas, the Bhagavans.

original: dga' bo / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dga' bo / 'di lta ste /
translated: Ananda, it is like this:

original: dper na / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khang pa nas khang par 'gro'ang de nam 'tsho ba dang; nam 'chi ba'i dus kyis bar du rkang pa'i mthil gnyis kyi sa la mi 'gro'o //🔽dga' bo / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi me tog kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur gyi bar du /
analyzed: dper na / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khang pa nas khang par 'gro'ang de nam 'tsho ba dang; nam 'chi ba'i dus kyis bar du rkang pa'i mthil gnyis kyi sa la mi 'gro'o // dga' bo / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi me tog kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur gyi bar du /
translated: For example, a universal monarch, even when moving from one palace to another, never sets his feet on the ground, until he has passed away and his life has ended.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, Nanda, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Suvarṇottama will go from buddha realm to buddha realm until he fully awakens to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.🔽”

original: de @226b nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
analyzed: de @226b nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
translated: Then the venerable Nanda thought this:

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su blta'o snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su blta'o snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas /
translated: Then the Bhagavān, knowing the thoughts that were in the mind of the venerable Nanda,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te //
translated: said this to the venerable Nanda:

original: dga' bo / de de bzhin te /
analyzed: dga' bo / de de bzhin te /
translated: “Nanda, it is so, it is so.

original: ji ltar yongs su rtog pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su rtog pa de bzhin no //
translated: It is just as you have thought.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar gyi me tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar gyi me tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du /
translated: In the buddha realm of the tathāgata, the arhat, the perfectly enlightened buddha Sāgara­vara­dhara­buddhi­vikrīḍitābhijña,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji snyed cig 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji snyed cig 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag ni /
translated: however many bodhisattva mahāsattvas gather,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus par blta ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus par blta ste /
translated: they should be regarded as an assembly of tathāgatas.

original: de'i dge slong gi dge 'dun yang tshad zin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dge slong gi dge 'dun yang tshad zin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: His saṅgha of bhikṣus will not be limited in number.”

original: de'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la nyan thos brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //🔽nyan thos stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //
analyzed: de'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la nyan thos brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do // nyan thos stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //
translated: The saṅgha of bhikṣus of that buddha had this many hundreds of śrāvakas,🔽this many thousands of śrāvakas,

analyzed: nyan thos brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do // nyan thos bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //
translated: this many hundreds of thousands of śrāvakas,🔽this many millions of śrāvakas,

original: nyan thos bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //🔽nyan thos bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //
analyzed: nyan thos bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do // nyan thos bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //
translated: this many tens of millions of śrāvakas,🔽this many billions of śrāvakas,

original: nyan thos bye ba brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //
analyzed: nyan thos bye ba brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do //
translated: this many tens of billions of śrāvakas,🔽this many trillions of śrāvakas.

original: nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes dge slong gi dge 'dun de'i tshad bzung bar mi nus te /🔽gzhan du na nyan @227a *//
analyzed: nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes dge slong gi dge 'dun de'i tshad bzung bar mi nus te / gzhan du na nyan @227a *//
translated: It was not possible to count the extent of that saṅgha of bhikṣus.🔽It was only possible to say that it was this many incalculable,

original: thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med gzhal du med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med gzhal du med par 'gyur ro //
translated: immeasurable hundreds of sextillions of śrāvakas.

original: dga' bo / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs gser gyi me tog bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: dga' bo / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs gser gyi me tog bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: Ananda, in the Buddha-land of the Tathagata Arhat Samyaksambuddha Suvarnapuspa,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bstan pa'i skyon 'di dag thams cad du thams cad mi 'byung zhing mi srid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bstan pa'i skyon 'di dag thams cad du thams cad mi 'byung zhing mi srid do //
translated: all these faults taught in this perfection of wisdom will be completely absent and impossible.

original: dga' bos gsol pa /
analyzed: dga' bos gsol pa /
translated: Ananda said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sring mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhig la mchod pa bgyis nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
analyzed: sring mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhig la mchod pa bgyis nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
translated: to which Tathagata Arhat Samyaksambuddha did this sister make offerings, plant the roots of virtue,

original: slar mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed par gyur /
analyzed: slar mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed par gyur /
translated: and generate the irreversible mind?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: dga' bo / sring mo 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas /
analyzed: dga' bo / sring mo 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas /
translated: Nanda, this sister planted the roots of virtue in the presence of the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One Dipankara,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
translated: and generated the intention to achieve unsurpassable, perfect enlightenment.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de la'ang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de la'ang /
translated: She dedicated those roots of virtue to unsurpassable, perfect enlightenment.🔽And she scattered golden flowers on the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One Dipankara,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gser gyi me tog nyid kyis gtor to //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gser gyi me tog nyid kyis gtor to //
translated: in order to pursue unsurpassable, perfect enlightenment.

original: dga' bo / @227b ngas gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dga' bo / @227b ngas gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir /
translated: Nanda, when I pursued unsurpassable, perfect enlightenment,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la autpa la lnga gtor ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la autpa la lnga gtor ba de'i tshe /
translated: When I scattered five utpala flowers to the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One Dīpaṃkara,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par mkhyen nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par mkhyen nas /
translated: the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One Dīpaṃkara, knowing that I had the roots of virtue,

original: nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
analyzed: nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
translated: prophesied my unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de'i tshe sring mo 'dis nga'i lung bstan pa de thos nas /
analyzed: de'i tshe sring mo 'dis nga'i lung bstan pa de thos nas /
translated: At that time, this sister heard my prophecy

original: 'di snyam du bdag kyang ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u 'di lung bstan pa de bzhin du ma 'ongs ba'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bdag kyang ji ltar bram ze'i khye'u 'di lung bstan pa de bzhin du ma 'ongs ba'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par gyur cig /
translated: and thought, ‘Just as this young brahmin has been prophesied, in the future may I also be prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: ces sems bskyed de /
analyzed: ces sems bskyed de /
translated: She gave rise to that thought.🔽Nandaka, in that way this sister,

original: dga' bo / de ltar sring mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i drung du /
analyzed: dga' bo / de ltar sring mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i drung du /
translated: in the presence of the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One Dīpaṃkara,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed do //
translated: and generated the first thought of awakening to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dga' bos gsol pa /
analyzed: dga' bos gsol pa /
translated: Nanda said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: sring mo 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du yongs su sbyang bar bgyis pa'o //
analyzed: sring mo 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du yongs su sbyang bar bgyis pa'o //
translated: this sister has thoroughly purified herself for the sake of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽dga' bo / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / dga' bo / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: “Nanda, it is so, it is so.

original: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no //
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: dga' bo / sring mo 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'o //🔽shes @228a *// rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: dga' bo / sring mo 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'o // shes @228a *// rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
