translated: Nanda, this sister has thoroughly purified herself for the sake of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: le'u bzhi bcu gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu gsum pa'o ////
translated: This was the forty-third chapter, “Nanda,” of “The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya bzhi bcu pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya bzhi bcu pa //
translated: Scroll Forty-Four

original: de na tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de na tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: There the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom get used to emptiness?

original: ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
translated: How should they enter into the meditative stabilization on emptiness?

original: ji ltar mtshan ma med pa la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan ma med pa la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they get used to signlessness?

original: ji ltar mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
translated: How should they enter into the meditative stabilization on signlessness?

original: ji ltar smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris bar bgyi /
translated: How should they get used to wishlessness?

original: ji ltar smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /🔽ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi / ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they enter into the meditative stabilization on wishlessness?🔽How should they get used to the applications of mindfulness?

original: ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the applications of mindfulness?

original: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should we become familiar with the correct exertions?

original: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should we cultivate the correct exertions?🔽How should we become familiar with the bases of supernatural powers?

original: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should we cultivate the bases of supernatural powers?🔽How should we become familiar with the faculties?

original: ji ltar dbang po rnams bsgom par @228b bgyi; ji ltar bsgom pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po rnams bsgom par @228b bgyi; ji ltar bsgom pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should we cultivate the faculties? How should we become familiar with the powers?

original: ji ltar stobs rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar stobs rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should we cultivate the powers?🔽How should we become familiar with the branches of awakening?

original: ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should we cultivate the branches of awakening?🔽How should we become familiar with the noble eightfold path?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should we cultivate the noble eightfold path?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they become familiar with the noble truths?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar bsam gtan rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar bsam gtan rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the noble truths?🔽How should they become familiar with the meditative concentrations?

original: ji ltar bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar tshad med pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /🔽ji ltar tshad med pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar tshad med pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi / ji ltar tshad med pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the meditative concentrations?🔽How should they become familiar with the immeasurable aspirations?🔽How should they cultivate the immeasurable aspirations?

original: ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they become familiar with the formless absorptions?

original: ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the formless absorptions?🔽How should they become familiar with the deliverances?

original: ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the deliverances?

original: ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they become familiar with the meditative stabilities?

original: ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the meditative stabilization of the successive absorptions?

original: ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation?

original: @229a *// ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: @229a *// ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation?🔽How should they train in the clairvoyances?

original: ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the clairvoyances?🔽How should they train in the meditative stabilizations?

original: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the meditative stabilizations?🔽How should they train in the dhāraṇī gateways?

original: ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the dhāraṇī gateways?

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the powers of the tathāgatas?

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they train in the powers of the tathāgatas?

original: ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they become familiar with the fearlessnesses?

original: ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the fearlessnesses?🔽How should they become familiar with the detailed and thorough knowledges?

original: ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /🔽ji ltar byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /🔽ji ltar byams pa chen po bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bgyi / ji ltar byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dris par bgyi / ji ltar byams pa chen po bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the detailed and thorough knowledges?🔽How should they become familiar with great love?🔽How should they cultivate great love?

original: ji ltar snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they become familiar with great compassion?

original: ji ltar snying rje chen po bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar snying rje chen po bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate great compassion?

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they become familiar with the distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate the distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: bcom ldan 'das @229b kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das @229b kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should cultivate the perfection of wisdom like this: they should not stand in form, and they should not stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /🔽gzugs stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas / gzugs stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: He should investigate the eye as empty,🔽he should investigate the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind as empty.🔽He should investigate form as empty,🔽he should investigate sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas as empty.🔽He should investigate the eye element as empty,

original: tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽'du shes stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // 'du shes stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: he should investigate the form element, the eye-consciousness element, and the eye-contact element as empty.🔽He should investigate the sensation which arises from the condition of eye-contact as empty.🔽He should investigate the ear element as empty,

original: 'du byed stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: he should investigate the sound element, the ear-consciousness element, and the ear-contact element as empty.🔽He should investigate the sensation which arises from the condition of ear-contact as empty.🔽He should investigate the nose element as empty,

original: mig stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽rna ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: mig stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // rna ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: he should investigate the smell element, the nose-consciousness element, and the nose-contact element as empty.🔽He should investigate the sensation which arises from the condition of nose-contact as empty.🔽He should investigate the tongue element as empty,

original: sna stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽lce stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: sna stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // lce stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: he should investigate the taste element, the tongue-consciousness element, and the tongue-contact element as empty.🔽He should investigate the sensation which arises from the condition of tongue-contact as empty.🔽He should investigate the body element as empty,

original: lus stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽yid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: lus stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // yid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: he should investigate the tangible element, the body-consciousness element, and the body-contact element as empty.🔽He should investigate the sensation which arises from the condition of body-contact as empty.🔽He should investigate the mind element as empty,🔽he should investigate the dharma element, the mind-consciousness element, and the mind-contact element as empty.🔽He should investigate the sensation which arises from the condition of mind-contact as empty.

original: gzugs stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽sgra stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽sgra stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: He should investigate the earth element as empty,🔽he should investigate the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element as empty.

original: dri stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽ro stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: dri stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // ro stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate smells as empty.🔽You should investigate tastes as empty.

original: reg stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: reg stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate touches as empty.

original: chos stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: chos stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate mental phenomena as empty.🔽You should investigate eye consciousness as empty.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate ear consciousness as empty.🔽You should investigate nose consciousness as empty.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate tongue consciousness as empty.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate body consciousness as empty.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate mind consciousness as empty.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong @230a *//🔽zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong @230a *// zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate eye contact as empty.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate ear contact as empty.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: one should investigate the nose-contact as empty.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: one should investigate the tongue-contact as empty.🔽one should investigate the body-contact as empty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: one should investigate the mind-contact as empty.🔽one should investigate the feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact as empty.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: one should investigate the feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact as empty.🔽one should investigate the feeling that arises from the condition of nose-contact as empty.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: one should investigate the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue-contact as empty.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: one should investigate the feeling that arises from the condition of body-contact as empty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag pa bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag pa bya'o //
translated: One should investigate the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally compounded as being empty.🔽One should investigate the earth element as being empty.

original: chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate the water element as being empty.

original: me'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: me'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate the fire element as being empty.🔽One should investigate the wind element as being empty.

original: nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate the space element as being empty.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate the consciousness element as being empty.

original: ma rig pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate ignorance as being empty.

original: 'du byed stong zhes bya bar brtag par @230b bya'o; ;rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed stong zhes bya bar brtag par @230b bya'o; ;rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate volitional factors as being empty. One should investigate consciousness as being empty.

original: ming dang gzugs stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate name and form as being empty.

original: skye mched drug stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate the six sense sources as being empty.

original: reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: reg pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate contact as being empty.

original: tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽sred pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // sred pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate feeling as ‘empty.’🔽You should investigate craving as ‘empty.’

original: len pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽srid pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: len pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // srid pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate appropriation as ‘empty.’🔽You should investigate existence as ‘empty.’

original: skye ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate birth as ‘empty.’

original: rga shi stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rga shi stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate old age and death as ‘empty.’

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate the perfection of generosity as ‘empty.’

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate the perfection of moral discipline as ‘empty.’🔽You should investigate the perfection of patient acceptance as ‘empty.’🔽You should investigate the perfection of perseverance as ‘empty.’

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate the perfection of meditative stability as ‘empty.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate the perfection of wisdom as ‘empty.’

original: nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o; ;phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o; ;phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate inner emptiness as ‘empty.’ You should investigate outer emptiness as ‘empty.’

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate inner and outer emptiness as ‘empty.’

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate the emptiness of emptiness as ‘empty.’

original: chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate great emptiness as ‘empty.’🔽You should investigate ultimate emptiness as ‘empty.’

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa @231a *//
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa @231a *//
translated: You should investigate conditioned emptiness as ‘empty.’

original: nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate unconditioned emptiness as ‘empty.’🔽You should investigate the emptiness of the unlimited as ‘empty.’

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end as ‘empty.’

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonrejection should be considered as empty.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence should be considered as empty.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena should be considered as empty.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics should be considered as empty.🔽The emptiness of nonapprehension should be considered as empty.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings should be considered as empty.🔽The emptiness of essential nature should be considered as empty.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings should be considered as empty.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness should be considered as empty.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The right efforts should be considered as empty.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “The bases of supernatural powers are empty,” you should know.🔽“The faculties are empty,” you should know.

original: stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “The powers are empty,” you should know.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “The branches of awakening are empty,” you should know.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “The noble eightfold path is empty,” you should know.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “The noble truths are empty,” you should know.

original: bsam @231b gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam @231b gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “The meditative concentrations are empty,” you should know.

original: tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “The immeasurables are empty,” you should know.🔽“The formless absorptions are empty,” you should know.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o; ;rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o; ;rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “The liberations are empty,” you should know.🔽“

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: “You should consider the formless absorptions to be empty.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should consider the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness gateways to liberation to be empty.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should consider the higher cognitions to be empty.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should consider the meditative stabilities to be empty.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should consider the dhāraṇī gateways to be empty.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should consider the powers of the tathāgatas to be empty.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should consider the fearlessnesses to be empty.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //🔽byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o // byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should consider the detailed and thorough knowledges to be empty.🔽You should consider great love to be empty.

original: snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should consider great compassion to be empty.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha are to be investigated as empty.

original: 'dod pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The desire realm is to be investigated as empty.

original: gzugs kyi khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The form realm is to be investigated as empty.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: The formless realm is to be investigated as empty.

original: de'ang ci nas kyang de ltar brtags nas sems g-yeng bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de'ang ci nas kyang de ltar brtags nas sems g-yeng bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtag par bya ste /
translated: And that is to be investigated in such a way that, having investigated in that way, the mind does not become distracted.

original: des @232a *// sems mi g-yeng ba dang ldan pas chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: des @232a *// sems mi g-yeng ba dang ldan pas chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Because of that, with a mind that is not distracted, he does not see that dharma.

original: chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas mngon du mi byed do //
translated: Because he does not see that dharma, he does not actualize it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la bslabs pas /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la bslabs pas /
translated: It is because that bodhisattva great being, having trained in all dharmas as empty of their own marks,

original: tshos gang la'ang ris su chad par mi byed de /
analyzed: tshos gang la'ang ris su chad par mi byed de /
translated: does not make any dharma into something separate.

original: gang mngon du byed pa dang / gang mngon du bya ba dang / gang gis mngon du bya ba'i chos de dag thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang mngon du byed pa dang / gang mngon du bya ba dang / gang gis mngon du bya ba'i chos de dag thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see any dharma by which he might realize, or by which he might realize it, or by means of which he might realize it.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord, you have said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa'i chos rnams mngon du mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa de la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa'i chos rnams mngon du mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa de la /
translated: ‘Bodhisattva great beings should not realize empty dharmas.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings stand in emptiness

original: stong pa nyid mngon du mi bgyid pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid mngon du mi bgyid pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: without realizing emptiness?”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la rab tu rtag ste /🔽mngon du mi byed do /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la rab tu rtag ste / mngon du mi byed do /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings stand in emptiness endowed with the best of all aspects🔽but do not realize it.

original: mngon du bya'o snyam du mi rtog go /
analyzed: mngon du bya'o snyam du mi rtog go /
translated: They do not think, ‘I will realize it.’

original: mngon du bya ba yin no zhes bya bar mi rtog ste /
analyzed: mngon du bya ba yin no zhes bya bar mi rtog ste /
translated: He does not think, “I will actualize it.”

original: yongs su 'dris par bya bar rtog cing /🔽'di ni yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus yin gyi /
analyzed: yongs su 'dris par bya bar rtog cing / 'di ni yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus yin gyi /
translated: He thinks, “I will thoroughly familiarize myself with it.”🔽He thinks, “This is the time to thoroughly familiarize myself with it.

original: 'di ni mngon du bya ba'i dus ma @232b yin no zhes bya bar rtog go /
analyzed: 'di ni mngon du bya ba'i dus ma @232b yin no zhes bya bar rtog go /
translated: This is not the time to actualize it.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nyid du sems dmigs pa la 'dogs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nyid du sems dmigs pa la 'dogs te /
translated: “The bodhisattva great being, without settling the mind in equipoise, attaches the mind to the object.

original: des bar ma dor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des bar ma dor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te /
translated: In the interim, he does not fall away from the factors of awakening of the bodhisattva great being.

original: zag pa zad pa'ang mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa'ang mngon du mi byed do //
translated: He does not actualize the destruction of the defilements.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i ye shes rlabs po che dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i ye shes rlabs po che dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattva great being has such vast wisdom.

original: 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas shing /
translated: He abides in the factors of awakening.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus te /
translated: He thinks, “This is the time to thoroughly familiarize myself with it.

original: 'di ni mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so //
translated: “This is not the time to actualize it.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: 'di ltar 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
translated: know, ‘This is the time for the perfection of giving.

original: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //🔽'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so // 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time for the perfection of conduct.🔽This is the time for the perfection of patience.

original: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time for the perfection of perseverance.

original: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time for the perfection of concentration.

original: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time for the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to cultivate the applications of mindfulness.

original: 'di ni yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa'i dus so //🔽'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa'i dus so // 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to cultivate the right efforts.🔽This is the time to cultivate the legs of miraculous power.

original: 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni dbang po bsgom pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to cultivate the faculties.

original: 'di ni stobs bsgom pa'i dus @233a *//
analyzed: 'di ni stobs bsgom pa'i dus @233a *//
translated: This is the time to cultivate the powers.

original: so; ;'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa'i dus so //
analyzed: so; ;'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to cultivate the branches of awakening.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to cultivate the noble eightfold path.

original: 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to cultivate the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: 'di ni mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to attain the superknowledges.

original: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par bya ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to attain the meditative absorptions.

original: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob par bya ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to attain the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob par bya ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to attain the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to attain the four fearlessnesses.

original: 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to attain the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob par bya ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to attain the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: 'di ni byams pa chen po thob par bya ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni byams pa chen po thob par bya ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the time to attain great love.

original: 'di ni snying rje chen po thob par bya ba'i dus yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni snying rje chen po thob par bya ba'i dus yin te /
translated: This is the time to attain great compassion.

original: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin /
translated: This is not the time to actualize the fruit of entering the stream.

original: 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin /
translated: This is not the time to actualize the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin /
translated: This is not the time to actualize the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin /
translated: This is not the time to actualize the fruit of arhatship.

original: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon du bya ba'i dus ma yin te /
translated: This is not the time to actualize the knowledge of a pratyekabuddha.

original: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba yongs su mi btang ba'i dus so zhes bya bar brtag par @233b bya ste; rab 'byor /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba yongs su mi btang ba'i dus so zhes bya bar brtag par @233b bya ste; rab 'byor /
translated: This is the time not to give up on attaining the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
translated: They are familiar with emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /🔽mtshan ma med pa la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa yin / mtshan ma med pa la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
translated: and they practice with emptiness.🔽They are familiar with the absence of marks

original: mtshan ma med pas rnam par spyod pa yin /🔽smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pas rnam par spyod pa yin / smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
translated: and they practice with the absence of marks.🔽They are familiar with the absence of wishes

original: smon pa med pas rnam par spyod pa yin /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsgom zhing /
analyzed: smon pa med pas rnam par spyod pa yin / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsgom zhing /
translated: and they practice with the absence of wishes.🔽They cultivate the applications of mindfulness

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom zhing /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin / yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom zhing /
translated: and they practice with the applications of mindfulness.🔽They cultivate the right efforts

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsgom zhing /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsgom zhing /
translated: and they practice with the right efforts.🔽They cultivate the legs of miraculous power

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /🔽dbang po rnams la bsgom zhing /🔽dbang po rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin / dbang po rnams la bsgom zhing / dbang po rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /
translated: and they practice with the legs of miraculous power.🔽They cultivate the faculties🔽and they practice with the faculties.🔽They cultivate the powers

original: stobs rnams la bsgom zhing /
analyzed: stobs rnams la bsgom zhing /
translated: and they practice with the powers.

original: stobs rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom zhing /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom zhing /
translated: they practice the powers;🔽they cultivate the branches of awakening;

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin /
translated: they practice with the branches of awakening;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa yang mngon par mi byed pa yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa yang mngon par mi byed pa yin /
translated: they do not manifest the cultivation of the noble eightfold path;

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yongs su 'dris par byed pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yongs su 'dris par byed pa yin /
translated: Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings practice with the dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa yin /🔽byang chub @234a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa yin / byang chub @234a *//
translated: they cultivate the dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa yin te /
translated: they practice with the dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du mi byed do //
translated: but they do not actualize the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du mi byed do //
translated: they do not actualize the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du mi byed do /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du mi byed do /
translated: they do not actualize the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du mi byed do //
translated: and they do not actualize the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub mngon du mi byed do //
translated: they do not actualize individual enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / skyes bu zhig dpa' zhing mchog tu rtsal che la shin tu brtan zhing gzugs mdzes la /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu zhig dpa' zhing mchog tu rtsal che la shin tu brtan zhing gzugs mdzes la /
translated: For example, a man is brave, has the highest skill, is very stable, has a beautiful form,

original: byad bzhin bzang zhing blta na sdug pa /
analyzed: byad bzhin bzang zhing blta na sdug pa /
translated: a good face, and is pleasant to look at.

original: kha dog bzang po mchog tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: kha dog bzang po mchog tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He has the best, most extensive, good color,

original: 'phong rtsal mchog tu byang ba; mtshon cha sra ba thogs pa /
analyzed: 'phong rtsal mchog tu byang ba; mtshon cha sra ba thogs pa /
translated: is armed with strong weapons,

original: sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: has mastered all sixty-four arts,

original: bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas thams cad rtogs par rig pa /
analyzed: bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas thams cad rtogs par rig pa /
translated: and is known to have realized all the crafts and occupations.

original: 'gro ba mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa /
translated: He is attractive and pleasant to look at for many beings.

original: bya ba gang dang gang rtsom yang thams cad du rnyed pa chen po dang ldan te /
analyzed: bya ba gang dang gang rtsom yang thams cad du rnyed pa chen po dang ldan te /
translated: Whatever activities he undertakes, he is endowed with great gain in all of them.

original: rnyed pa des skye bo mang po la rim gror byed /🔽bkur stir byed /🔽phu dud du byed /
analyzed: rnyed pa des skye bo mang po la rim gror byed / bkur stir byed / phu dud du byed /
translated: With that gain he serves many beings,🔽honors them,🔽pays them homage,

original: mchod par byed /
analyzed: mchod par byed /
translated: and makes offerings to them.

original: de shin tu dga' zhing spro ba dang / nyams dga' ba dang / yid bde ba rgya chen po dag skyes nas dgos pa zhig gi phyir /
analyzed: de shin tu dga' zhing spro ba dang / nyams dga' ba dang / yid bde ba rgya chen po dag skyes nas dgos pa zhig gi phyir /
translated: For some reason,

original: pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dag khrid de /
analyzed: pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dag khrid de /
translated: he takes his parents, children, and wife🔽and goes to a frightening,

original: 'brog dgon pa byis pa rnams 'jigs shing /🔽skye g-ya' bar song ste /
analyzed: 'brog dgon pa byis pa rnams 'jigs shing / skye g-ya' bar song ste /
translated: dangerous, and terrifying wilderness.

original: skyes bu des der phyin nas /
analyzed: skyes bu des der phyin nas /
translated: When that man arrives there,

original: pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma la mi 'jigs pa byin te /
analyzed: pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma la mi 'jigs pa byin te /
translated: he gives his parents, children, and wife protection from fear,

original: 'jigs par ma byed /
analyzed: 'jigs par ma byed /
translated: saying, “Do not be afraid!

original: ma @234b 'jigs shig /
analyzed: ma @234b 'jigs shig /
translated: Do not be afraid!

original: bdag gis khyed 'brog dgon pa 'jigs shing nyams mi bde ba 'di las myur du gdon cing myur du thar bar bya'o zhes mi 'jigs pa byin te /
analyzed: bdag gis khyed 'brog dgon pa 'jigs shing nyams mi bde ba 'di las myur du gdon cing myur du thar bar bya'o zhes mi 'jigs pa byin te /
translated: I will quickly free you from this frightening, dangerous, and terrifying wilderness.”🔽In that wilderness, many enemies and adversaries who want to kill him are nearby.

original: 'brog dgon pa der skyes bu de la gsod pa'i dgra phyir rgol ba mang po nye bar gnas par gyur nas skyes bu de'ang shes rab kyi mthu dam pa dang ldan par gyur te /
analyzed: 'brog dgon pa der skyes bu de la gsod pa'i dgra phyir rgol ba mang po nye bar gnas par gyur nas skyes bu de'ang shes rab kyi mthu dam pa dang ldan par gyur te /
translated: That man has the power of excellent wisdom.

original: des pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dag 'brog dgon pa de nas bton te /
analyzed: des pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dag 'brog dgon pa de nas bton te /
translated: He would then lead his parents, children, and wife out of the wilderness.

original: bde zhing nyon ma mongs par thar par byas nas /🔽phyir grong ngam /🔽grong khyer ram /
analyzed: bde zhing nyon ma mongs par thar par byas nas / phyir grong ngam / grong khyer ram /
translated: He would lead them to safety and freedom,🔽and they would arrive without injury🔽in a village,🔽a town,

original: grong rdal lam /
analyzed: grong rdal lam /
translated: a city,

original: ljongs kyi 'dabs su ma snad ma nyams par phyin nas; dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes te /
analyzed: ljongs kyi 'dabs su ma snad ma nyams par phyin nas; dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes te /
translated: or a district. They would be happy and joyful.

original: dgra phyir rgol ba'i sems can de dag la'ang sems kyis sdang bar mi byed de /
analyzed: dgra phyir rgol ba'i sems can de dag la'ang sems kyis sdang bar mi byed de /
translated: He would not harbor any ill will toward those beings who were his adversaries.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: skyes bu des sgyu rtsal thams cad la byang bar byas pas /🔽des 'brog dgon pa der phyir rgol ba de dag pas phyir rgol ba gzhan ches phal che ba /
analyzed: skyes bu des sgyu rtsal thams cad la byang bar byas pas / des 'brog dgon pa der phyir rgol ba de dag pas phyir rgol ba gzhan ches phal che ba /
translated: Because that man had mastered all the arts.

original: ches mang ba /
analyzed: ches mang ba /
translated: In the wilderness, he would conjure up even more numerous,

original: ches dpa' ba /
analyzed: ches dpa' ba /
translated: more powerful,🔽and more courageous adversaries

original: ches mtshon sra ba dang ldan pa dag sprul te /
analyzed: ches mtshon sra ba dang ldan pa dag sprul te /
translated: with stronger weapons than the ones he had already faced.

original: phyir rgol ba de dag thams cad 'jigs pa de med par gyur nas /
analyzed: phyir rgol ba de dag thams cad 'jigs pa de med par gyur nas /
translated: All those adversaries would be free from fear.

original: skyes bu des pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma de dag nyon ma mongs par thar bar byas nas /
analyzed: skyes bu des pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma de dag nyon ma mongs par thar bar byas nas /
translated: “Subhūti, it is just like that man who, after freeing his parents, his son, and his wife from their distress,

original: bde bar rnam par spyod pa zhig yod na /🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du gang gi tshe /
analyzed: bde bar rnam par spyod pa zhig yod na / rab 'byor / de bzhin du gang gi tshe /
translated: lives happily.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la byams par dmigs pa'i sems dang / snying rjer dmigs @235a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la byams par dmigs pa'i sems dang / snying rjer dmigs @235a *//
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, when a bodhisattva great being has pervaded all sentient beings with a mind that is focused on love,

original: pa'i sems dang / dga' bar dmigs ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms su dmigs pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas gnas te /
analyzed: pa'i sems dang / dga' bar dmigs ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms su dmigs pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas gnas te /
translated: a mind that is focused on compassion, a mind that is focused on joy, and a mind that is focused on equanimity,

original: de'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa bzhi la gnas shing /
analyzed: de'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa bzhi la gnas shing /
translated: at that time a bodhisattva great being, standing in the four immeasurables,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: perfects the six perfections.

original: yongs su rdzogs par byas nas zag pa zad pa ma thob bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par byas nas zag pa zad pa ma thob bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
translated: Having perfected them, without attaining the destruction of the outflows, he familiarizes himself with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas shing /
translated: They stand in the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed de /
translated: and they familiarize themselves with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma la'ang rnam par mi spyod /
analyzed: de'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan ma la'ang rnam par mi spyod /
translated: At that time, bodhisattva great beings do not engage with signs,

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang mngon du byas pas /🔽nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang mngon du byas pas / nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: and they do not actualize the signless absorption,🔽by actualizing which they would stand on the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'ang mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'ang mngon du mi byed do //
translated: or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na; 'dab chags bya ni bar snang la rgyu zhing sa la mi ltung ste /
analyzed: dper na; 'dab chags bya ni bar snang la rgyu zhing sa la mi ltung ste /
translated: Birds fly through the sky but do not fall to the ground.

original: nam mkha' bar snang la gnas kyang de la gnas pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' bar snang la gnas kyang de la gnas pa med do //
translated: They stand in the sky but do not stand on anything.🔽Subhūti, in the same way, bodhisattva great beings familiarize themselves with emptiness

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
translated: and

original: stong pa nyid la'ang rnam par spyod /🔽mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la'ang rnam par spyod / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
translated: and they also practice emptiness,🔽and they also familiarize themselves with signlessness and wishlessness,

original: @235b mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang rnam par spyod de /
analyzed: @235b mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la'ang rnam par spyod de /
translated: and they also practice signlessness and wishlessness,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang mngon du bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang mngon du bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
translated: but they do not actualize emptiness, signlessness, or wishlessness in such a way that they would perfect the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love,

original: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba'ang mngon du mi byed de /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba'ang mngon du mi byed de /
translated: great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and fall to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dag la spyad nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dag la spyad nas /
translated: They practice the immeasurable buddhadharmas

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: and then they attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / skyes bu mthu dang ldan pa 'phong rtsal gyi slob dpon du gyur pa /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu mthu dang ldan pa 'phong rtsal gyi slob dpon du gyur pa /
translated: For example, a powerful man, a master of archery,

original: 'phong rtsal bslab pa la shin tu byang ba zhig yod la /
analyzed: 'phong rtsal bslab pa la shin tu byang ba zhig yod la /
translated: who is very skilled in archery training,

original: des mda' zhig gnam du 'phangs te /
analyzed: des mda' zhig gnam du 'phangs te /
translated: shoots an arrow into the sky,

original: mda' de gnam du 'phangs nas mda' gzhan zhig gcig nas gcig tu brgyud du 'phangs pas /
analyzed: mda' de gnam du 'phangs nas mda' gzhan zhig gcig nas gcig tu brgyud du 'phangs pas /
translated: and after shooting that arrow into the sky, shoots another arrow after another in succession,

original: mda' snga ma de sa la ltung du ma bcug ste /
analyzed: mda' snga ma de sa la ltung du ma bcug ste /
translated: so that he does not let that first arrow fall to the ground.

original: ji srid du skyes bu des da ni mngal 'di sa la ltung bar bya'o snyam du 'dod par ma byas pa de srid du mda' de sa la mi ltung ste /
analyzed: ji srid du skyes bu des da ni mngal 'di sa la ltung bar bya'o snyam du 'dod par ma byas pa de srid du mda' de sa la mi ltung ste /
translated: As long as that man does not think, “Now I will let this arrow fall to the ground,” that arrow will not fall to the ground.

original: nam mda' phyi ma ma 'phangs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam mda' phyi ma ma 'phangs pa de'i tshe /
translated: But when he does not shoot another arrow,

original: mda' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag sa la ldog go /
analyzed: mda' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag sa la ldog go /
translated: then those arrows, one after another, will fall to the ground.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung @236a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung @236a *//
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom, who is skilled in means,

original: ba'ang ji srid du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: ba'ang ji srid du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon du mi byed do //
translated: and as long as those wholesome roots have not matured into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they do not actualize the ultimate limit.

original: nam dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de na /
analyzed: nam dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de na /
translated: When those wholesome roots have matured into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon du byed do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon du byed do //
translated: then they actualize the ultimate limit.

original: rab 'byor / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: “Therefore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos de dag gi chos nyid de ltar yongs su brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: chos de dag gi chos nyid de ltar yongs su brtag par bya'o //
translated: should investigate the true dharmic nature of those dharmas in that way.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos nyid 'di la slob pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos nyid 'di la slob pa /
translated: bodhisattva great beings who train in this true dharmic nature

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' la slob pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' la slob pa /
translated: train in the ultimate limit,

original: de bzhin nyid la slob pa /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la slob pa /
translated: train in suchness,

original: chos kyi dbyings la slob pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la slob pa /
translated: train in the dharma-constituent,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa /
translated: they train in the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽they train in the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa /
translated: they train in the emptiness of non-rejection,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa /
translated: they train in the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa /
translated: they train in the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa /
translated: they train in the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob cing /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob cing /
translated: and they train in the three gateways to liberation.

original: bar mdor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa ste /
analyzed: bar mdor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa ste /
translated: “Blessed One, it is difficult to train in the three gateways to liberation and not fall short of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: it is amazing!

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Well-Gone One,

original: shin tu ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: shin tu ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: it is truly amazing!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis @236b bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis @236b bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is because bodhisattva great beings do not abandon any sentient being.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba de dag gi smon lam gyi khyad par ni rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba de dag gi smon lam gyi khyad par ni rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro //
translated: Subhuti : What is the difference between the perfection of wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings, and that of the Disciples and Pratyekabuddhas?

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su ma btang ste /🔽dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la gnas pa 'di dag ni bdag gis yongs su dgrol bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i sems mngon par sgrub cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su ma btang ste / dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la gnas pa 'di dag ni bdag gis yongs su dgrol bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i sems mngon par sgrub cing /
translated: The Lord: The perfection of wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings, is distinguished by the great vehicle.🔽The perfection of wisdom of the Disciples and Pratyekabuddhas is distinguished by the vehicle of the Disciples and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang; rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang; rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
translated: Subhuti : What is the perfection of wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings, distinguished by the great vehicle?🔽The Lord: Here the Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom, does not review form, etc. as permanent or impermanent, as ease or ill, as self or not self, as calm or not calm, as void or not void, as afflicted or purified, as produced or stopped, as compounded or uncompounded.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he is accomplishing the meditative stabilization which is the gate of liberation that is wishless,

original: ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed par rig par bya'o //
translated: it should be known that until he has attained the knowledge of all aspects, he does not in the interim actualize the very limit of reality.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when a bodhisattva great being

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is practicing the perfection of wisdom like this,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid @237a *//
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid @237a *//
translated: he should practice the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: dang; 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dang; 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-observation, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / gnas zab mo de dag la brtag par 'dod par gyur na /🔽des 'di ltar 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / gnas zab mo de dag la brtag par 'dod par gyur na / des 'di ltar 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: If one wishes to investigate those profound topics, the three doors of liberation and so on,🔽one should think as follows:

original: yun ring po zhig nas bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / 'gro bar 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / skyes bur 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: yun ring po zhig nas bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / 'gro bar 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / skyes bur 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /
translated: “These sentient beings have for a long time conceived of a self, conceived of a sentient being, conceived of a life force, conceived of an individual, conceived of a person, conceived of a
