original: shed can du 'du shes pa dang / shed bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / byed pa por 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba por 'du shes pa dang / shes pa bor 'du shes pa dang / mthong ba por 'du shes pas dmigs pa la @237b spyod kyi de dag gi dmigs pa spang ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems mngon par sgrub par bya'o
analyzed: shed can du 'du shes pa dang / shed bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / byed pa por 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba por 'du shes pa dang / shes pa bor 'du shes pa dang / mthong ba por 'du shes pas dmigs pa la @237b spyod kyi de dag gi dmigs pa spang ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems mngon par sgrub par bya'o
translated: They should think, ‘I will attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment and then teach the sacred doctrine in order to relinquish the objective range of those who engage in the objective range of the view of the perishable composite, the view of self, the view of sentient beings, the view of living beings, the view of individuality, the view of personality, the view of an agent, the view of an experiencer, the view of an observer, and the view of one who sees and hears.’

original: // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon du byas pas /
analyzed: // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon du byas pas /
translated: “At that time, the bodhisattva great beings should enter into the meditative stabilities of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, which are the gateways of liberation.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang; dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang; dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba mngon du mi byed do //
translated: or individual enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa de dag dang; dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ni bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' yad mngon du mi byed de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa de dag dang; dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ni bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' yad mngon du mi byed de /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings with those thoughts, those wholesome roots, and with skillful means do not actualize the very limit of reality in the interval.🔽They do not diminish the perfection of giving,🔽they do not diminish the perfection of morality,🔽they do not diminish the perfection of patience,🔽they do not diminish the perfection of perseverance,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not diminish the perfection of concentration,🔽they do not diminish the perfection of wisdom,🔽and they do not diminish the emptiness of emptiness,🔽the emptiness of great extent,🔽the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽the emptiness of the past,🔽the emptiness of the future,🔽the emptiness of the present,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of nonrepudiation,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽the emptiness of all things,🔽the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽the emptiness of nonapprehension,🔽the emptiness of nonexistence,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,🔽the emptiness of essential nature of nonexistence,🔽the emptiness of essential nature of both,🔽the emptiness of the inconceivable,🔽the emptiness of the unproduced,🔽the emptiness of the unmanifest,🔽the emptiness of the unapprehendable,🔽the emptiness of the insubstantial,🔽the emptiness of the substantial,🔽the emptiness of the substantial and the insubstantial,🔽the emptiness of the conditioned,🔽the emptiness of the unconditioned,🔽the emptiness of the ultimate,🔽the emptiness of the compounded,🔽the emptiness of the uncompounded,🔽the emptiness of the past,🔽the emptiness of the future,🔽the emptiness of the present,🔽the emptiness of the internal,🔽the emptiness of the external,🔽the emptiness of the great,🔽the emptiness of the small,🔽the emptiness of the minute,🔽the emptiness of the infinite,🔽the emptiness of the coarse,🔽the emptiness of the subtle,🔽the emptiness of the far,🔽the emptiness of the near,🔽the emptiness of the manifest,🔽the emptiness of the unmanifest,🔽the emptiness of the existent,🔽the emptiness of the nonexistent,🔽the emptiness of the existent and the nonexistent,🔽the emptiness of the

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the transcendent perfection of perseverance will not wane,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration will not wane,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the transcendent perfection of wisdom will not wane.

original: nang @238a *// stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nang @238a *// stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Inner emptiness will not wane,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: outer emptiness will not wane,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and inner and outer emptiness will not wane.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness will not wane,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro // don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the great emptiness will not wane,🔽and the ultimate emptiness will not wane.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena will not wane,🔽and the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena will not wane.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned will not be diminished,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited will not be diminished,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end will not be diminished,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-dispersal will not be diminished,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence will not be diminished,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of all things will not be diminished,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics will not be diminished,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension will not be diminished,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence will not be diminished,🔽and the emptiness of the ultimate will not be diminished.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities will not decrease.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur @238b ro; ;yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur @238b ro; ;yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The four applications of mindfulness will not decrease. The four right efforts will not decrease.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dbang po lnga'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro // dbang po lnga'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The four legs of manifestation will not decrease.🔽The five faculties will not decrease.

original: stobs lnga'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs lnga'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The five powers will not decrease.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The seven aspects of enlightenment will not decrease.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //🔽bsam gtan bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro // bsam gtan bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The noble eightfold path will not decrease.🔽The four noble truths will not decrease.🔽The four concentrations will not decrease.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The four immeasurables will not decrease.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the four formless absorptions will not decline;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the eight aspects of liberation will not decline;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the nine serial steps of meditative absorption will not decline;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro; ;mngon par shes pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro; ;mngon par shes pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness aspect of liberation, the signless aspect of liberation, and the aspirationless aspect of liberation will not decline;🔽the five eyes will not decline;

original: ting nge 'dzin yang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //🔽gzungs kyi sgo'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro // gzungs kyi sgo'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the six superknowledges will not decline;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas will not decline;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the four fearlessnesses will not decline;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib @239a *//
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang yongs su 'grib @239a *//
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges will not decline;

original: par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha will not decline;

original: byams pa chen po'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and great love will not be diminished.

original: snying rje chen po'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and great compassion will not be diminished.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha will not be diminished.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening will not be diminished.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, in that way, at that time,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings are endowed with the dharmas on the side of awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they will not be diminished.

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel zhing de'i dbang po rnams kyang ches rno bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel zhing de'i dbang po rnams kyang ches rno bar 'gyur te /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who is assisted by skillful means increases in virtuous qualities and his faculties become very sharp,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lta bu ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lta bu ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: unlike those of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam ste /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva thinks like this:

original: sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas phyin ci log bzhi la spyod spyod pa /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas phyin ci log bzhi la spyod spyod pa /
translated: ‘These sentient beings have long engaged in the four errors,

original: rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa la spyod spyod pa yin gyis /
analyzed: rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa la spyod spyod pa yin gyis /
translated: engaging in the perception of permanence, the perception of happiness, the perception of self, and the perception of beauty.

original: de dag gi phyir byang chub tu spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi phyir byang chub tu spyad par bya'o //
translated: For their sake, I will practice for awakening.’

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon @239b par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ci nas kyang rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon @239b par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ci nas kyang rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: Having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, I will teach the Dharma so that the proliferation of ‘permanent,’

original: bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: ‘happy,’

original: bdag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: ‘self,’

original: sdug ces bya ba'i yongs su rgyu ba med par chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste /
analyzed: sdug ces bya ba'i yongs su rgyu ba med par chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste /
translated: and ‘beautiful’ will be eliminated.”

original: sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan par thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan par thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: Endowed with those kinds of thoughts, they practice the perfection of wisdom with skillful means.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: They do not actualize the very limit of reality without completing the ten tathāgata powers,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: without completing the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: without completing the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs /🔽byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs / byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: without completing the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽without completing great love,

original: snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed do //
translated: and without completing great compassion.

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed do //
translated: At that time, the bodhisattva mahāsattva enters into the meditative absorption of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, the gateways to liberation, but does not actualize the very limit of reality until he has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas dmigs pa la spyod spyod pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas dmigs pa la spyod spyod pa ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva thinks, ‘These beings have long been engaged in the practice of apprehending🔽a self,
