original: 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas smon lam la spyod spyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas smon lam la spyod spyod pa ste /
translated: they think, ‘These sentient beings have been practicing aspirations for a long time.

original: 'di ltar brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in Śakra, Brahmā, the world guardians, and universal monarchs.

original: gzugs la mngon par dga'o //🔽tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: gzugs la mngon par dga'o // tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in form.🔽They delight in feeling.

original: 'du shes la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: 'du shes la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in perception.

original: 'du byed la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: 'du byed la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in consciousness.

original: mig la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: mig la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the eyes.

original: rna ba la mngon par dga'o //🔽sna la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rna ba la mngon par dga'o // sna la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the ears.🔽They delight in the nose.

original: lce la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: lce la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the tongue.

original: lus la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: lus la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the body.

original: yid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: yid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the mind.

original: gzugs la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: gzugs la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in sights.

original: sgra la mngon par dga'o //🔽dri la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: sgra la mngon par dga'o // dri la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in sounds.🔽They delight in smells.

original: ro la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: ro la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in tastes.

original: reg la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: reg la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in tactile objects.

original: chos la mngon par dga'o //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: chos la mngon par dga'o // mig gi rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in mental phenomena.🔽They delight in eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes @244a *//
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o // lus kyi rnam par shes @244a *//
translated: They delight in the tongue consciousness.

original: pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the mind consciousness.🔽They delight in eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in ear contact.🔽They delight in nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.🔽They delight in the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue and its object.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body and its object.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o //🔽sa'i khams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par dga'o // sa'i khams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the mind and its object.🔽They delight in the earth element.

original: chu'i khams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the water element.

original: me'i khams la mngon par dga'o //🔽rlung gi khams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: me'i khams la mngon par dga'o // rlung gi khams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the fire element.🔽They delight in the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in ignorance.

original: 'du byed la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: 'du byed la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in name and form.

original: skye mched drug la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the six sense sources.

original: reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: reg pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in contact.

original: tshor ba la @244b mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la @244b mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in feeling.

original: sred pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: sred pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in craving.

original: len pa la mngon par dga'o //🔽srid pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: len pa la mngon par dga'o // srid pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in appropriation.🔽They delight in existence.

original: skye ba la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: skye ba la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in birth.

original: rga shi la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rga shi la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the perfection of discipline.🔽They delight in the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga'o // nang stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the perfection of wisdom.🔽They delight in inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in inner and outer emptiness.🔽They delight in the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽They delight in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽They delight in the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽They delight in the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They delight in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //🔽ngo bo @245a *//🔽nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o // ngo bo @245a *// nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness of non-entities.🔽They delight in the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //🔽dbang po rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par dga'o // dbang po rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the legs of miraculous power.🔽They delight in the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the truths of the noble ones.

original: bsam gtan rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the formless absorptions.

original: rnam pa thar pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thar pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the successive absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //🔽byams pa chen po @245b la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par dga'o // byams pa chen po @245b la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽They delight in great love.

original: snying rje chen po la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the distinct attributes of the buddhas.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the result of stream enterer.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par dga'o //
translated: They delight in the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: they delight in the state of a worthy one;

original: rang byang chub la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub la mngon par dga'o //
translated: they delight in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: they delight in the knowledge of path aspects;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par dga'o //
translated: and they delight in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de lta bas na de dag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: de lta bas na de dag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: Therefore, I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for their sake,

original: ci nas kyang sems can rnams kyi smon lam gyi nyes pa de dag med par 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can rnams kyi smon lam gyi nyes pa de dag med par 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste /
translated: and I will teach the Dharma to them in such a way that those beings’ faults of aspiration will be eliminated.’

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa de dag dang ldan la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa de dag dang ldan la /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings endowed with those thoughts,

original: thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: skillfully practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
translated: He will perfect the cultivation of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: He will not perfect the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: he will not perfect the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: he will not perfect the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: he will not perfect the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs /
analyzed: byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs /
translated: he will not perfect great love,

original: @246a *// snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs shing /
analyzed: @246a *// snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs shing /
translated: he will not perfect great compassion,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon du mi byed do //
translated: and he will not actualize the very limit of reality until he fully and completely awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
translated: Subhuti, when the Bodhisattva-mahāsattva practices the perfection of giving, practices the perfection of morality, practices the perfection of patience, practices the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: practices the perfection of concentration, practices the perfection of wisdom, practices inner emptiness, practices outer emptiness, practices inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: They are those who practice the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of the great, the emptiness of the ultimate, the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang; thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, the emptiness of nature, and the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / @246b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / @246b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
translated: They are practicing when they practice the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: They are practicing when they practice the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: the branches of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: They practice the formless absorptions, they practice the liberations, they practice the serial absorptions, they practice the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation,

original: smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
translated: they practice the clairvoyances, they practice the meditative stabilizations, they practice the dhāraṇī gateways, they practice the powers of the tathāgatas, they practice the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang 'dris par byed cing /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang 'dris par byed cing /
translated: they practice the detailed and thorough knowledges, they practice great love, they practice great compassion, and they practice the distinct attributes of the buddhas.

original: de lta bu'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par 'du bya ba @247a *//🔽med par ltung ba'am /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par 'du bya ba @247a *// med par ltung ba'am /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings who have the vision of that kind of wisdom do not fall into non-conditioning,

original: khams gsum pa dang lhan cig gnas pa'i gnas med cing skabs med de /
analyzed: khams gsum pa dang lhan cig gnas pa'i gnas med cing skabs med de /
translated: and there is no opportunity or occasion for them to dwell together with the three realms.

original: de ni gnas ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni gnas ma yin no //
translated: That is not possible.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod cing /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that,🔽who are familiar with these dharmas that are aspects of awakening,🔽how do they practice these dharmas

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di dag la yongs su 'dris par byed pa de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos 'di🔽dag la spyad de /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di dag la yongs su 'dris par byed pa de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos 'di🔽dag la spyad de /
translated: so as to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: yongs su 'dris par byas nas stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang rtogs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang; dgra bcom pa'i nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: yongs su 'dris par byas nas stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang rtogs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang; dgra bcom pa'i nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Having become familiar with it, they do not actualize emptiness and the very limit of reality, through realizing which they would attain the fruit of entering the stream,🔽attain the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, attain the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, attain arhatship,

original: rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid mngon du mi byed cing /
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid mngon du mi byed cing /
translated: attain individual enlightenment,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed pa yin /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed pa yin /
translated: or actualize the very limit of reality.

original: ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa'ang mngon du mi byed /
analyzed: ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa'ang mngon du mi byed /
translated: “How is it that they do not actualize the signless,

original: smon pa med pa'ang mngon du mi byed /🔽mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'ang mngon du mi byed /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'ang mngon du mi byed / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'ang mngon du mi byed /
translated: do not actualize the wishless,🔽do not actualize the absence of an intrinsic nature,🔽do not actualize the absence of attributes,🔽do not actualize the absence of production,

original: skye ba med pa'ang mngon du mi byed /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'ang mngon du mi byed /
translated: do not actualize the absence of cessation,🔽do not actualize the absence of defilement,

original: dngos po med pa'ang mngon du mi byed la /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'ang mngon du mi byed la /
translated: and do not actualize the absence of purification,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bsgom par bya zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bsgom par bya zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: and yet cultivate the perfection of wisdom?”

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la /
translated: Subhūti, if those bodhisattva great beings

original: byang chub sems @247b dpa' dag gis de skad du dris na /
analyzed: byang chub sems @247b dpa' dag gis de skad du dris na /
translated: are asked by other bodhisattvas

original: 'di la lan glong zhing des stong pa nyid yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la lan glong zhing des stong pa nyid yid la bya'o //
translated: to explain this, they should explain it by bringing emptiness to mind.

original: des mtshan ma med pa yid la bya'o //
analyzed: des mtshan ma med pa yid la bya'o //
translated: They should bring signlessness to mind.

original: des smon pa med pa yid la bya'o //🔽des mngon par 'du bya ba med pa yid la bya'o //
analyzed: des smon pa med pa yid la bya'o // des mngon par 'du bya ba med pa yid la bya'o //
translated: They should bring wishlessness to mind.🔽They should bring non-conditioning to mind.

original: des skye ba med pa yid la bya'o //
analyzed: des skye ba med pa yid la bya'o //
translated: They should bring non-arising to mind.

original: des 'gag pa med pa yid la bya'o //
analyzed: des 'gag pa med pa yid la bya'o //
translated: They should bring non-cessation to mind.

original: des dngos po med pa yid la bya'o zhes zer na /
analyzed: des dngos po med pa yid la bya'o zhes zer na /
translated: They should bring non-entities to mind.🔽Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings should know that those bodhisattva great beings

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya'o //
translated: have been prophesied by the lord buddhas to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dris par bya ba de brjod do //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dris par bya ba de brjod do //
translated: “It is thus, Subhūti, that irreversible bodhisattva great beings are to be known, that they are to be spoken about,

original: de lung ston to //
analyzed: de lung ston to //
translated: that they are to be prophesied,

original: de rab tu 'byed do //
analyzed: de rab tu 'byed do //
translated: that they are to be differentiated.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de skad du dris na 'di skad du lung ston cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de skad du dris na 'di skad du lung ston cing /
translated: Subhūti, if a bodhisattva great being is asked about this, they should give this prophecy:

original: des stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
analyzed: des stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
translated: ‘They should not get used to emptiness.

original: des mtshan ma med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
analyzed: des mtshan ma med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not get used to signlessness.

original: des smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //🔽des mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
analyzed: des smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o // des mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not get used to wishlessness.🔽They should not get used to not acting.

original: des skye ba med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
analyzed: des skye ba med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not get used to nonproduction.

original: des 'gag pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
analyzed: des 'gag pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not get used to nonstopping.

original: des dngos po med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
analyzed: des dngos po med pa la yongs su 'dris par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not get used to nonexistence.

original: des byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yongs su @248a *//
analyzed: des byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yongs su @248a *//
translated: It is the perfection of the factors of awakening.🔽

original: 'dris par mi bya'o zhes zer na /
analyzed: 'dris par mi bya'o zhes zer na /
translated: “They should not train in the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings should know that those bodhisattva great beings have not been prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by those lord buddhas.

original: par bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: par bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su 'dris par bya ba de mi brjod cing lung mi ston la rab tu mi 'byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su 'dris par bya ba de mi brjod cing lung mi ston la rab tu mi 'byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because they do not explain, do not teach, and do not reveal that training in the irreversible bodhisattva great beings.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos gang yin pa de mi brjod pa dang / lung mi ston pa dang / rab tu mi 'byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos gang yin pa de mi brjod pa dang / lung mi ston pa dang / rab tu mi 'byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
translated: and the dharmas of the irreversible Bodhisattva great being are not spoken of, are not taught, are not revealed, then those Bodhisattva great beings should know that this Bodhisattva great being has not been predicted to the utmost, right and perfect awakening by past fully awakened Buddhas.

original: yongs su 'dris par byas nas /
analyzed: yongs su 'dris par byas nas /
translated: Having thoroughly familiarized themselves with it,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyir mi ldog pa'i sa non pa ltar; bsrabs pa'i sa non pa ma yin no zhas bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyir mi ldog pa'i sa non pa ltar; bsrabs pa'i sa non pa ma yin no zhas bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: they should know that this Bodhisattva great being has not mounted on the irreversible stage, as the irreversible Bodhisattva great being has mounted on the irreversible stage, and has not mounted on the thinning stage.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gang gis slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam /
analyzed: gang gis slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam /
translated: is there a category by which one does not turn back?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ni yod de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni yod de /
translated: “Subhūti, there is.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug thos kyang rung /🔽ma thos kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug thos kyang rung /🔽ma thos kyang rung ste /
translated: If a Bodhisattva great being hears the six perfections or not,

original: @248b phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ba bzhin du lan glon pa'o //
analyzed: @248b phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ba bzhin du lan glon pa'o //
translated: “It is the reply of a bodhisattva great being who is irreversible.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: de'i slad du byang chub tu spyod pa ni mang ste /🔽phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su sbyang ba'i sa'am /
analyzed: de'i slad du byang chub tu spyod pa ni mang ste / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su sbyang ba'i sa'am /
translated: there are many who practice for awakening,

original: yongs su sbyang ba ma lags pa'i sa la gnas pa bzhin du lan 'debs pa ni nyung ngo //
analyzed: yongs su sbyang ba ma lags pa'i sa la gnas pa bzhin du lan 'debs pa ni nyung ngo //
translated: but few who reply like a bodhisattva great being who is irreversible, whether on the ground of training or the ground of no training.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so, it is so.🔽It is just as you have said.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi sar lung bstan pa de dag ni nyung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi sar lung bstan pa de dag ni nyung ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is because there are few bodhisattva great beings who are predicted to the irreversible wisdom ground.

original: gang lung bstan pa de dag ni rnam pa de bzhin du lan glon te /
analyzed: gang lung bstan pa de dag ni rnam pa de bzhin du lan glon te /
translated: Those who are predicted reply in just that way.

original: gang rnam pa de ltar lan glon pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: gang rnam pa de ltar lan glon pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o; ;rab 'byor /
translated: One should know that those who answer in such a way have planted the roots of virtue.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang de dag ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang de dag ni /
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings

original: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi 'phrogs pa'o //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi 'phrogs pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: cannot be swayed by the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: le'u bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This was the forty-fourth chapter, “The Inconceivable Dharma of the Buddha,” of “The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya zhe gnyis pa /
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya zhe gnyis pa /
translated: In Two Hundred and Fifty Chapters

original: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Lord said to the venerable Subhūti:

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam na'ang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam na'ang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, if bodhisattva great beings, even in a dream, do not arouse a desire for the śrāvaka level,

original: rang sangs @249a *//
analyzed: rang sangs @249a *//
translated: the pratyekabuddha level,

original: rgyas kyi sa'am /🔽khams gsum pa la 'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed /
analyzed: rgyas kyi sa'am / khams gsum pa la 'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed /
translated: or the three realms,

original: legs pa'i sems mi bskyed cing /
analyzed: legs pa'i sems mi bskyed cing /
translated: and do not arouse a good mind,

original: chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /
analyzed: chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /
translated: “They should view all phenomena as being like a dream.

original: chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /🔽chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /🔽chos thams cad smig rgyu dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba nyid du lta / chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba nyid du lta / chos thams cad smig rgyu dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /
translated: They should view all phenomena as being like an echo.🔽They should view all phenomena as being like a mirage.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /
translated: They should view all phenomena as being like a magical display.

original: chos thams cad dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /
analyzed: chos thams cad dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra ba nyid du lta /
translated: They should view all phenomena as being like a city of gandharvas.🔽They should view all phenomena as being like an apparition.

original: chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra ba nyid du lta ba mngon du mi byed na /
analyzed: chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra ba nyid du lta ba mngon du mi byed na /
translated: If they do not actualize all phenomena,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Su­bhūti, this should be known as the defining characteristic of the irreversible great bodhisattva beings who are irreversible from unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhabs 'bring brgya phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring stong phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhabs 'bring brgya phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring stong phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, if a bodhisattva mahāsattva, even in a dream, sees many hundreds of retinues of the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas, many thousands of retinues, many hundreds of thousands of retinues,

original: zhabs 'bring bye ba phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnga' ba dge slong dang /
analyzed: zhabs 'bring bye ba phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / zhabs 'bring bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnga' ba dge slong dang /
translated: many millions of retinues, many hundreds of millions of retinues, many thousands of millions of retinues, many hundreds of thousands of millions of retinues, many quintillions of retinues,

original: dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin @249b dang; nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos kun nas bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston pa mthong la /
analyzed: dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin @249b dang; nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos kun nas bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston pa mthong la /
translated: and by nuns, laymen, laywomen, gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas,

original: des chos de thos nas /🔽chos de'i don shes par bya'o zhes chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la zhugs shing /
analyzed: des chos de thos nas / chos de'i don shes par bya'o zhes chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la zhugs shing /
translated: and having heard that Dharma🔽he thinks, ‘I will understand the meaning of that Dharma,’ and he is intent on the Dharma and devoted to the Dharma,

original: gnas pa dang mthun par zhugs te /
analyzed: gnas pa dang mthun par zhugs te /
translated: and he is intent on living in accordance with that Dharma.

original: gnyer ba'i chos la spyod pa mthong na /
analyzed: gnyer ba'i chos la spyod pa mthong na /
translated: If he practices the Dharma that he is devoted to,

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this is also a defining mark of a bodhisattva great being who is irreversible.”🔽“Furthermore, Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible from awakening do not practice the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom in a way that is not yoked with skillful means.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la 'phags shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la 'phags shing /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings see in a dream the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly awakened Buddha, flying up into the sky,

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos ston pa mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos ston pa mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
translated: teaching the Dharma to the community of monks, endowed with the thirty-two marks of a great being,

original: 'od 'dom gang pa mnga' ba /
analyzed: 'od 'dom gang pa mnga' ba /
translated: with a body shining a fathom,🔽displaying many miracles and magical powers,

original: rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul mang po ston pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul mang po ston pa /
translated: emanating many emanations,🔽and those emanations performing the activities of a buddha in other world systems,🔽Subhūti, this too should be known as a defining mark of the irreversible bodhisattva great being.”🔽“Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings see in a dream the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly awakened Buddha, teaching the Dharma to the community of monks, with a body shining a fathom,🔽displaying many miracles and magical powers,

original: sprul pa mang po sprul pa mdzad cing /
analyzed: sprul pa mang po sprul pa mdzad cing /
translated: emanating many emanations,

original: sprul pa de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa mthong na /
analyzed: sprul pa de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa mthong na /
translated: and those emanations performing the activities of a buddha in other world systems,

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, this too should be known as a defining mark of the irreversible bodhisattva great being.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam na'ang grong bcom pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam na'ang grong bcom pa'am /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, if a bodhisattva mahāsattva, even in a dream, sees a city being destroyed,

original: grong khyer bcom pa'am /
analyzed: grong khyer bcom pa'am /
translated: or a town being destroyed,

original: me thar pa 'am /🔽gcan gzan khro bo mthong ngam /🔽de ma yin pa'i ri dvags @250a *//
analyzed: me thar pa 'am / gcan gzan khro bo mthong ngam / de ma yin pa'i ri dvags @250a *//
translated: or a fire spreading,🔽or a ferocious beast,

original: gtum po'i rnam pa mthong ngam /
analyzed: gtum po'i rnam pa mthong ngam /
translated: or a wild animal of a kind that is ferocious,

original: mgo bcad par gyur pa mthong ngam /
analyzed: mgo bcad par gyur pa mthong ngam /
translated: or a severed head,

original: de ma yin pa'i 'jigs shing mi zad pa dang / dngang par 'gyur ba mthong ngam /
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i 'jigs shing mi zad pa dang / dngang par 'gyur ba mthong ngam /
translated: or something else that is terrifying, unbearable, and frightening,

original: sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mthong ngam /
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mthong ngam /
translated: or sees suffering, unhappiness, and agitation,

original: bkres pa'am / skom pa mthong ngam /🔽pha shi ba mthong ngam /🔽ma shi ba mthong ngam /
analyzed: bkres pa'am / skom pa mthong ngam / pha shi ba mthong ngam / ma shi ba mthong ngam /
translated: or sees hunger or thirst,🔽or sees the death of a father,

original: phu nu shi ba mthong ngam /
analyzed: phu nu shi ba mthong ngam /
translated: or sees the death of a mother,

original: bu sring shi ba mthong ngam /
analyzed: bu sring shi ba mthong ngam /
translated: or sees the death of a brother,🔽or sees the death of a sister,

original: grogs po 'am gnyen bshes shi ba mthong na /
analyzed: grogs po 'am gnyen bshes shi ba mthong na /
translated: or sees the death of a friend or a relative,

original: mya ngan dang / 'jigs shing mi bzad pa dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: mya ngan dang / 'jigs shing mi bzad pa dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: he does not become sad, fearful, or terrified.

original: rmi lam de rmis pa'i 'og tu sad nas kyang 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: rmi lam de rmis pa'i 'og tu sad nas kyang 'di snyam ste /
translated: And after waking up from that dream, he thinks,

original: kye ma khams gsum pa 'di dag kun kyang rmi lam lta bu ste /
analyzed: kye ma khams gsum pa 'di dag kun kyang rmi lam lta bu ste /
translated: ‘Alas! All these three realms are like a dream.

original: bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: I too, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: khams gsum po'i chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur bstan par bya'o snyam na /
analyzed: khams gsum po'i chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur bstan par bya'o snyam na /
translated: will teach that all phenomena of the three realms are like a dream.’

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this too is a defining mark of an irreversible bodhisattva great being.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang ji ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang ji ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when an irreversible bodhisattva great being has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, in that buddhafield

original: ngan song gsum po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur bar rig par @250b bya zhe na /🔽gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam du sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can mthong ngam /🔽byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can mthong ngam /
analyzed: ngan song gsum po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur bar rig par @250b bya zhe na / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam du sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can mthong ngam / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can mthong ngam /
translated: If you ask, Will all the three lower realms be completely and totally eliminated?🔽 If a bodhisattva mahāsattva sees in a dream beings in the hells,🔽sees beings in the animal realm,🔽🔽

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can mthong na /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can mthong na /
translated: “If he should see all the beings in the hells, or the beings in the animal realms, or the beings in the world of Yama,

original: 'di lta bu'i dran pa 'thob cing /🔽dran pa thob nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i dran pa 'thob cing / dran pa thob nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: then, having seen them, he should think, ‘I will practice in such a way that in my buddhafield, when I have attained awakening, all the three lower realms will be completely and totally absent.’

original: ngan song gsum po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do //
analyzed: ngan song gsum po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do //
translated: Having seen them, he should think, ‘I will practice in such a way that in my buddhafield, when I have attained awakening, all the three lower realms will be completely and totally absent.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar rmi lam gang yin pa dang / rmi lam gyi mtha' gang yin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do snyam na /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rmi lam gang yin pa dang / rmi lam gyi mtha' gang yin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do snyam na /
translated: If he thinks, ‘That which is a dream and the end of a dream are not two, nor are they divided,’

original: rab 'byor / 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: then, Subhūti, you should know that this too is a defining mark of an irreversible bodhisattva great being.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam mam /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam mam /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, if a bodhisattva great being, whether in a dream or

analyzed: sad pa'i tshe grong khyer tshig par gyur na / 'di snyam du bdag gis rmi lam mam /
translated: when awake, sees a city on fire,🔽he should think, ‘If I, having seen such forms, ways, and signs in a dream or

analyzed: sad pa'i tshe rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang dag mthong ba'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par rig par bya ba'i rnam pa de dag dang /

original: tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag gal te bdag la yod na /
analyzed: tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag gal te bdag la yod na /
translated: If I have those signs and marks,

original: @251a *// bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis grong khyer mes tshig pa 'di zhi bar gyur cig /
analyzed: @251a *// bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis grong khyer mes tshig pa 'di zhi bar gyur cig /

analyzed: bsil bar gyur cig /

original: med par gyur cig snyam du sems na /
analyzed: med par gyur cig snyam du sems na /

original: gal te zhi ba dang / bsil ba dang / med par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te zhi ba dang / bsil ba dang / med par gyur na /
translated: If it is pacified, cooled, and extinguished,

analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this bodhisattva great being has been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

analyzed: khyim la la ni ma tshig / srang la la ni tshig /

original: khyim la la ni ma tshig pa las na /🔽sems can 'di dag gis chos spong ba'i las byas pas /🔽de dag gi las tshe 'di la rnam par smin te /
analyzed: khyim la la ni ma tshig pa las na / sems can 'di dag gis chos spong ba'i las byas pas / de dag gi las tshe 'di la rnam par smin te /
translated: “Subhūti, when a bodhisattva great being sees that some houses are burned and some houses are not burned,🔽he should know that those sentient beings have committed the act of abandoning the Dharma.🔽The karma of those sentient beings ripens in this life,

original: de dag chos la bkur ba de nyid kyi las kyi lhag ma'ang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag chos la bkur ba de nyid kyi las kyi lhag ma'ang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rig par bya ste /
translated: and the remainder of that karma will also ripen.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyu dang rkyen te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyu dang rkyen te /
translated: “Subhūti, those are the causes and conditions of an irreversible bodhisattva great being.

original: rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por rig par bya'o //
translated: Through those causes and those conditions, you should know that a bodhisattva great being is irreversible.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma @251b gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por rig par bya ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma @251b gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por rig par bya ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag bstan par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, I will teach the aspects, the signs, and the marks by which a bodhisattva great being is to be known as irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gal te bud med dam /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te bud med dam /
translated: “Subhūti, if a woman

original: skyes pa la la zhig mi ma yin pas byin gyis brlabs na /
analyzed: skyes pa la la zhig mi ma yin pas byin gyis brlabs na /
translated: or a man is possessed by a nonhuman being,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du /
translated: a bodhisattva great being should think,

original: gal te bdag sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te /
analyzed: gal te bdag sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te /
translated: ‘If I have been prophesied by the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas of the past to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bdag gi bsam pa yongs su dag cing /
analyzed: bdag gi bsam pa yongs su dag cing /
translated: if my thoughts are pure,

original: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod la /
analyzed: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod la /
translated: if I want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yid la byed pa yongs su dag ste /
analyzed: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yid la byed pa yongs su dag ste /
translated: I am purifying the mental activity of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bdag la nyan thos kyi sems med /
analyzed: bdag la nyan thos kyi sems med /
translated: I do not have the attitude of a śrāvaka.

original: bdag la rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med la /
analyzed: bdag la rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med la /
translated: I do not have the attitude of a pratyekabuddha.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pas /
translated: Because I do not have the attitude of a śrāvaka or a pratyekabuddha,

original: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /🔽bdag gdon mi za bar bla na med pa @252a *//
analyzed: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin gyi / bdag gdon mi za bar bla na med pa @252a *//
translated: It is not that I will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
translated: I will certainly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na /
translated: In the innumerable, limitless world systems,🔽however many Bhagavān Buddhas are present,🔽alive, and enduring, teaching the Dharma,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis ni gang ci'ang ma mkhyen pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis ni gang ci'ang ma mkhyen pa'am /
translated: those Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Perfectly Awakened Buddhas know everything,

original: ma gzigs pa'am /
analyzed: ma gzigs pa'am /
translated: see everything,

original: thugs su ma chud pa'am /
analyzed: thugs su ma chud pa'am /
translated: comprehend everything,

original: mngon du ma mdzad pa'am /🔽mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang med de /
analyzed: mngon du ma mdzad pa'am / mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang med de /
translated: manifest everything,🔽and are perfectly awakened to everything.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes bya bar bdag gi bsam pa thugs su chud ce na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes bya bar bdag gi bsam pa thugs su chud ce na /
translated: Those Bhagavān Buddhas know my thought that I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des skyes pa'am /
analyzed: bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des skyes pa'am /
translated: By that truth, by that true word, if this man or woman

original: bud med 'di mi ma yin pa gang gis bzung ba'am /
analyzed: bud med 'di mi ma yin pa gang gis bzung ba'am /
translated: has been seized by a nonhuman spirit,

original: gtses par gyur pa'i mi ma yin pa de gud du 'gro bar gyur cig ces bsams te smras na /
analyzed: gtses par gyur pa'i mi ma yin pa de gud du 'gro bar gyur cig ces bsams te smras na /
translated: and if he thinks, ‘May that nonhuman being who is causing trouble depart,’ and says that,

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de skad du brjod pas mi ma yin pa de gud du ma song na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de skad du brjod pas mi ma yin pa de gud du ma song na /
translated: Subhūti, if that nonhuman being does not depart when the bodhisattva great being says that,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @252b pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @252b pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great being has not been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the past tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces brjod pas mi ma yin pa de gud du song na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces brjod pas mi ma yin pa de gud du song na /
translated: Subhūti, if that nonhuman being does depart when the bodhisattva great being says that,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis /
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great being has been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the past tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya ste /
translated: and will be predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings endowed with those aspects, those signs, and those tokens are irreversible.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections,

original: thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa /
translated: not endowed with skillful means,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /
translated: not practicing the four applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la ma spyad pa /
translated: not practicing the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /🔽dbang po lnga la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la ma spyad pa / dbang po lnga la ma spyad pa /
translated: not practicing the four legs of miraculous power,🔽not practicing the five faculties,

original: stobs lnga la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: stobs lnga la ma spyad pa /
translated: not practicing the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la ma spyad pa /
translated: not practicing the seven limbs of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma spyad pa /
translated: not practicing the eightfold noble path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /
translated: not having practiced the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la ma spyad pa /
translated: not having practiced the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /
translated: not having practiced the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la ma spyad pa /
translated: not having practiced the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma spyod pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma spyod pa /
translated: not having practiced the eight aspects of liberation,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma spyad @253a *//
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma spyad @253a *//
translated: not having practiced the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: pa; rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ma spyad pa /
analyzed: pa; rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ma spyad pa /
translated: not having practiced the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ongs nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ongs nas /
translated: and not having entered into the maturity of a bodhisattva, then Māra the wicked one will approach him with the power of his own deceptions and will say,

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas te /
translated: “Subhūti, if a bodhisattva great being has performed the consecration of the truth

original: bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des mi ma yin pa de gud du 'gro bar gyur cig ces brjod pa las /
analyzed: bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des mi ma yin pa de gud du 'gro bar gyur cig ces brjod pa las /
translated: “By the truth and the true words by which I have been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas of the past, by that truth and those true words, may that nonhuman being leave!”

original: bdud sdig to can gyis mi ma yin par gyur pa de ci nas kyang gud du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan du byed de /
analyzed: bdud sdig to can gyis mi ma yin par gyur pa de ci nas kyang gud du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan du byed de /
translated: But the evil Māra will make an effort to make that nonhuman being leave.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can ni mi ma yin pa de bas ches mthu dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can ni mi ma yin pa de bas ches mthu dang ldan zhing /
translated: Because the evil Māra is more powerful and more majestic than that nonhuman being.

original: ches gzi brjid dang ldan pas de'i phyir bdud sdig to can de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mi ma yin pa de gud du song bar gyur pa la /
analyzed: ches gzi brjid dang ldan pas de'i phyir bdud sdig to can de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mi ma yin pa de gud du song bar gyur pa la /
translated: Therefore, by the blessing of the evil Māra, that nonhuman being will leave.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva will think,🔽“I have been predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas of the past.

original: de ltar bdag gi mthus mi ma yin pa de gud du song ngo snyam nas /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gi mthus mi ma yin pa de gud du song ngo snyam nas /
translated: “Thinking, ‘By my power that nonhuman being has left,’

original: bdud kyi mthus mi ma yin pa de gud du song bar ni ma shes te /
analyzed: bdud kyi mthus mi ma yin pa de gud du song bar ni ma shes te /
translated: he does not know that it was the power of Māra that caused that nonhuman being to leave.

original: de de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @253b chen po gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang / 'phya ba dang / 'thing slad byed cing smod la khyad du gsod cing /
analyzed: de de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @253b chen po gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang / 'phya ba dang / 'thing slad byed cing smod la khyad du gsod cing /
translated: Because of that, he despises, disparages, is contemptuous of, and insults other bodhisattvas, thinking,

original: bdag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin gyi /
